SageTVPlugin.Name: Anti-Favorites for Dummies Support
SageTVPlugin.Author: tmiranda
SageTVPlugin.Description: This is a support plugin for the Anti-Favorites for Dummies STV Mod.
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Version 0.03:
- Moved hosting from Google Code to GitHub. No change in functionality.
Version 0.02:
- Add ability to not mark future airings as Don't Like.
Version 0.01:
- First alpha.
